```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, fig.width=8, fig.height=4.5)

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)

# Note the relative file path, and not absolute file path:
# http://www.coffeecup.com/help/articles/absolute-vs-relative-pathslinks/
train <- read_csv("data/train.csv")
```


# Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
names(train)
require(mosaic)
tally(train$num_room)
ggplot(train,aes(x=price_doc,fill=num_room))+geom_histogram(binwidth=3e+6,position="dodge")+xlim(2e+07,5e+07)
ggplot(train,aes(x=timestamp,y=price_doc))+geom_point(alpha=0.5)
ggplot(train,aes(x=life_sq,y=price_doc))+geom_point(alpha=0.5)+xlim(0,250)
```
